trainers.name: Teacher Fischgesicht
trainers.engageText: Hey, you are not enrolled in this school!
trainers.loseText: Im going to call the police
trainers.winText: Now go away, before I call the police

trainers.name: Policeman Randy
trainers.loseText: I will make a exception for you, but please don't tell my boss

trainers.name: Math Teacher Mr. Klein
trainers.loseText: Damn cheater googled it for sure
trainers.winText: Hahaha now back in the classroom with you, I got some special lessons for you

trainers.name: Headmaster O'Brian
trainers.engageText: Noone can enter this school without my permission
trainers.winText: Now leave, I am sure a kindergarten still has a spot for you

trainers.name: Overfunded Science Teacher
trainers.engageText: These new crystals I created can evolve ANYTHING!
trainers.winText: Dont you dare taking my last crystal!
